DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Learning oral cancer screening practice , knowledge , opinion Ohio nurse home dentist may help study oral cancer future . PURPOSE : This clinical trial study oral cancer screen among nursing home dentist Ohio .
DOC.brief_title: Oral Cancer Screening Among Nursing Home Dentists Ohio
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To develop comprehensive sample nursing home dentist Ohio . - To document knowledge oral cancer detection among dentist . - To describe opinion dentists oral cancer screen competency . - To describe current oral cancer screen practice dentist . OUTLINE : Participants stratify accord geographical location ( urban vs rural ) . A comprehensive sample nursing home dentist practice Ohio contact recruitment letter ask respond question regard oral cancer screening practice , knowledge oral cancer detection , opinion oral cancer screen use newly develop survey , base part exist , pre-tested instrument ( Oral Cancer Prevention Early Detection Survey ) .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Dentist practice either fulltime parttime nursing home set state Ohio PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Not specify PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Not specify
